name: Blob Island
description:
Blob Island is my entry for the Game Dev League June Gene Jam Game Jam (Say that in one breath) and is by far one of the most fun projects I've worked on so far. I'm proud of the art, the AI's pretty good if I say so myself and the gameplay is what I wanted it to be.

In future I'd be very interested in picking this project up again and expanding it into something proper. For now, enjoy this little prototype! I didn't get the chance to add sound effects but other than that it's pretty fleshed out, honestly. 

God speed, XOXO
